name: Grapple Guy (Gary?) (UNFINISHED)
description:
The game barely finished as it is at the end of the jam, will continue to be improved!

Controls:
WASD Move
aim then hold space/left mouse to shoot grapple

While Grappled
a and d to swing

w and s to climb

let go of space/left mouse to ungrapple

Made for Cal Poly Game Development Club Veterans Day Game Jam.

Game Makin': Alec, Dylan, Nik, Tyler(TheLucky)

Art: Lapras Lazuli

Music: Yu(Twitter Itch.io Soundcloud  Youtube)
